response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is worth $1,000,000 to you. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

By accepting this offer, not only would you secure a remarkable asset at a favorable rate, but you would also benefit from my commitment to ensuring a seamless and personalized experience throughout the transaction process. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns and meet your long-term goals.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
